title: List building, data scraping and data entry into an XLS sheet
snippet:
We are looking to build an email database and need to go to individual websites to collect the information.  

Step 1 will be to find the appropriate page within the website where the people are. 

Step 2 will be to scrape the site and enter it into an excel sheet or google sheet.

Example:  Once you find the right page, like this http://www.methodist.edu/admissionsstaff.  We want the first name, last name, email, phone.  

There are about 500 colleges that we want to target.
